  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(int projectId, String projectName, String startDate, String endDate, double budget, int engineerId, int managerId, int architectId, int contractorId, int customerId)
      customer ID number /** Constructs a Project object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The unique identifier for the project.
      projectName - The name of the project.
      startDate - The start date of the project.
      endDate - The end date of the project.
      budget - The budget allocated for the project.
      engineerId - The ID of the assigned engineer.
      managerId - The ID of the assigned project manager.
      architectId - The ID of the assigned architect.
      contractorId - The ID of the assigned contractor.
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
